text: Glad we made it in time!

I'm truly sorry, Meguru.
It was my oversight.

Huh!? Not at all!
These things happen when you're working!

As long as it didn't affect the job,
it's all good in the end!

I need to reflect on this too.
Sorry for leaving everything to you, Producer.

No, no...
This is on me...
Yeah, but it's about my job, right?

Here's the thing...
Let's both be more careful! How about that, Meguru?

I think that's a good idea!
I'll be more careful next time!
